title: MedicalProcedure
description: A process of care used in either a diagnostic, therapeutic, preventive or palliative capacity that relies on invasive (surgical), non-invasive, or other techniques.

bodyLocation.description: Location in the body of the anatomical structure.

procedureType.description: The type of procedure, for example Surgical, Noninvasive, or Percutaneous.

followup.description: Typical or recommended followup care after the procedure is performed.

preparation.description: Typical preparation that a patient must undergo before having the procedure performed.
